blocks.title: Introduction
blocks.text:
These Website Standard Terms and Conditions written on this webpage shall manage your use of our website, Webiste Name accessible at v-core9.com.
These Terms will be applied fully and affect to your use of this Website. By using this Website, you agreed to accept all terms and conditions written in here. You must not use this Website if you disagree with any of these Website Standard Terms and Conditions.
Minors or people below 18 years old are not allowed to use this Website.

blocks.title: Intellectual Property Rights
blocks.text:
Other than the content you own, under these Terms, V-core9 and/or its licensors own all the intellectual property rights and materials contained in this Website.
You are granted limited license only for purposes of viewing the material contained on this Website.

blocks.title: Restrictions
blocks.text: Certain areas of this Website are restricted from being access by you and V-core9 may further restrict access by you to any areas of this Website, at any time, in absolute discretion. Any user ID and password you may have for this Website are confidential and you must maintain confidentiality as well.

blocks.title: Your Content
blocks.text: In these Website Standard Terms and Conditions, “Your Content” shall mean any audio, video text, images or other material you choose to display on this Website. By displaying Your Content, you grant V-core9 a non-exclusive, worldwide irrevocable, sub licensable license to use, reproduce, adapt, publish, translate and distribute it in any and all media.

blocks.title: No warranties
blocks.text: This Website is provided “as is,” with all faults, and V-core9 express no representations or warranties, of any kind related to this Website or the materials contained on this Website. Also, nothing contained on this Website shall be interpreted as advising you.

blocks.title: Limitation of liability
blocks.text: In no event shall V-core9, nor any of its officers, directors and employees, shall be held liable for anything arising out of or in any way connected with your use of this Website whether such liability is under contract.  V-core9, including its officers, directors and employees shall not be held liable for any indirect, consequential or special liability arising out of or in any way related to your use of this Website.
